channel.title: Help!.?
channel.description: ok guys... i want to know if some1 hosts my server do i still get all the character files and stuff stored on my computer when people logg on?

item.title: Help!.?
item.dc:creator: @iKolli iKolli`
item.description:
@iKolli wrote:

No.

You will only have all of the character files, and everything else, if it’s hosted on YOUR computer.

If not, then the hoster will have it all.

Unless you use MySQL, that changes everything.
(But they could hack your mysql)

Read full topic
